code_snippet:
async def connect(self):
    if self.is_connected():
        raise Exception("Already connected, use .disconnect() first")
    await self.realtime.connect()
    await self.update_session()
    return True

pattern_analysis.contextual_code:
async def connect(self):
    if self.is_connected():
        raise Exception("Already connected, use .disconnect() first")
    await self.realtime.connect()
    await self.update_session()
    return True
